EmailTemplate.description: This is the invite for the November webinar with Chad and Melissa. Cloned from the October webinar invite.
EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_GET Partner Newsletter_2018.November 2018 GET Webinar invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Global Ecosystem November Webinar: PKS and the Partner Ecosystem
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Pivotal Container Service is having an impact on customers of every size, shape, and industry vertical. We are excited to have Chad Sakac, SVP, Global Alliances and Melissa Larson, Director of Boutique System Integrators presenting the opportunity PKS presents for our partner ecosystem. They are both deeply embedded in the development of our strategy to make PKS the most complete and enterprise-ready Kubernetes platform.
- PKS Product Update and Roadmap - Customer Stories - Resources to build PKS knowledge and stay connected
Looking forward to seeing you there!
Date: Wednesday, November 14, 2018 Time: 11AM PST
Thanks, The Pivotal Global Ecosystem Team Register here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/webinars-events.aspx]]>
